# Speakers

```{r results="asis", echo=FALSE}
for (x in yaml::read_yaml("../data/speakers.yaml")) {
cat(":::: {.columns}\n")
cat("##", x$nom, "\n")
# 1st column
cat("::: {.column width=66%}\n")
cat("**", x$pos, "**\n\n", sep="")
cat(x$txt, "\n\n")
cat(sprintf("[%s]()", x$web), "\n")
cat(":::\n")
# 2nd column
cat("::: {.column width=33%}\n")
cat(sprintf("![](../images/speakers/%s)", x$pic), "\n")
cat(":::\n")
cat("::::\n")
}
```
